dict.acceptation: 飞行员；引航员；向导；[机械学]导向器（或轴）；
驾驶；试验；试点；为（船舶）引航（或操舵）；
试验性的；导向的；驾驶员的；辅助的；

sent.orig: Pilot production of Mg-Al hydrotalcite was investigated and pilot test procedure was obtained.
sent.trans: 对镁铝水滑石的生产进行了中试研究，获取了中试生产的工艺条件。

sent.orig: The pilot zone with certain recently state, what does pilot drugstore have?
sent.trans: 最近国家确定的试点地区，试点药店有哪些？

sent.orig: Lifesaving pilot chair is an ideal equipment for pilot leaving aircraft in ane-emergency.
sent.trans: 航空座椅救生弹射弹是飞行员应急离机的理想装置。

sent.orig: After the pilot cut the helicopter's engines, she turned in her seat to face me.
sent.trans: 在那个飞行员熄灭了直升机引擎后，她转过身面朝我。

sent.orig: The reform pilot this time covers a wide range.
sent.trans: 这次改革试点的范围很宽泛！
